item.title: Nvm
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:9, topic:460836”]Maybe you could make it so when they have enough money they can buy there rank
(not staff) but cool ranks that have fun crowns or cool features. Make it an economy server so its hard to gain money and they can buy trial mod for 2147M
now that would be awesome! I would even want to help you with it![/quote]
That would be bad considering there’s never a real set price for anything on a RSPS, hence people can net in around 1b a day just off merchanting from noobs who don’t know item rarity. Now, if you put in the whole trade limit, then you would be onto something.

Read full topic

item.title: Nvm
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

I would never do this because there really wouldn’t be a purpose in playing. If everyone is aware of the trial leveling system, they will obviously take extra precaution just to eventually receive the official Moderator status. Most servers collapse due to corrupt staff systems and this is another factor that could cause that corruption.

Read full topic

item.title: Nvm
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

I also like this idea because it would encourage people to be active, while stopping people from asking “Can I be Mod???FADF ” lol… i hate those kids.

Read full topic

item.title: Nvm
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I don’t know, I’ve given up on staff systems in servers anymore. I’ve seen some well thought out ones that fail because no one is ever mature enough to handle being a moderator it seems.

Read full topic

item.title: Nvm
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

You shouldnt have your server based around staff and trial mod and stuff, that usually attracts the 12 year olds. If you were to do an idea like that, you should do a rank system like activity points I guess. or the last rank number 10 is trial mod, then 1-9 are called something different, like
-regular
-member
-superior member
-veteran
-Mayor
-tycoon
-VIP
-MIP(most important player)
-trial mod

Read full topic

item.title: Nvm
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

If everyone had a crown, it wouldn’t be special. Showing off the crown is one of the best parts (sadly). I think a traditional staff system to optimize a server better.

Read full topic
